sentences.en: At first, for instance, you may find it hard to get used to the shantytowns that will replace the exurban sprawl of McMansions that helped fuel the real estate speculation bubble.
sentences.cn: 首先，举例来说，您可能会发现，你们会很难习惯于棚户区, 这将取代导致燃料和房地产投机泡沫的城市远郊豪宅的扩张。

sentences.en: In 2004, Bush won by substantial margins in growing exurban and rural areas.
sentences.cn: 2004年，布什因在人口日益增长的远郊和乡村地区大幅度领先而获胜。

sentences.en: Only a decade ago, the place was exurban rice paddies and lychee orchards.
sentences.cn: 十年前，这个地方只是一个城市的远郊，种植水稻和荔枝。

sentences.en: We have found ourselves a beautiful exurban retreat.
sentences.cn: 我们已在城市远郊找到一处美丽的安静之地.
